snippet.title: Stunt Flyer - Sierra On-Line, 1985 - Commodore 64 (4K)
snippet.description:
A short presentation of Stunt Flyer, developed by Nice Ideas in France and published by Sierra On-Line for the Commodore 64 in 1985.

The Video is done in conjunction with the following article on my blog:

Stunt Flyer, the first game from Europe
https://retro365.blog/2023/05/24/stunt-flyer-the-first-game-from-europe/

Enjoy and please remember to visit my blog at https://www.retro365.blog where I post new articles every month.

Training mode 0:42
Airshow mode 5:03
